name: Bolthrower (C64) Commodore 64
description:
Brutal Combat Strategy Action Game

- survive through vicious Fenrir wolf packs (grey) - defeat the she-wolf Ulfhild (blue) - slay the the mystical bear manimal Bjorn (brown) - escape the wrath of Vladimir and his minions (red) - conquer the cosmic diety Bronomir (white) - with either champions Sviatopolk (with bolt) - or the bezerker Eric the Bloodaxe (with axe) - make it to the end, embrace your destiny and   all the glory that you ever dreamed of will be yours. * Bonus: on game title screen, press left for music; right for sfx.
